verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against mountain <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and prophesy against it <WH5012>,

And say <WH559> unto it <WH559>, Thus says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Behold <WH2022>, O mountain Seir <WH8165>, I am against you <WH5186>, and I will stretch out my hand <WH3027> against you <WH5414>, and I will make you most <WH4923> desolate <WH8077>.
I will lay <WH7760> your cities <WH5892> waste <WH2723>, and you shall be desolate <WH8077>, and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

Because you have had a perpetual <WH5769> hatred <WH342>, and have shed <WH5064> the blood of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> by the force <WH3027> of the sword <WH2719> in the time <WH6256> of their calamity <WH343>, in the time <WH6256> that their iniquity <WH5771> had a end <WH7093>:

Therefore <WH2416>, as I live, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, I will prepare <WH6213> you unto blood <WH1818>, and blood <WH1818> shall pursue <WH7291> you <WH518>: since you have not hated <WH8130> blood <WH1818>, even blood <WH1818> shall pursue you <WH7291>.
Thus will I make <WH5414> mountain <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> most <WH8077> desolate <WH8077>, and cut off <WH3772> from it him that passes out <WH5674> and him that returns <WH7725>.

And I will fill <WH4390> his mountains <WH2022> with his slain <WH2491> men <WH1389>: in your hills, and in your valleys <WH1516>, and in all your rivers <WH650>, shall they fall <WH5307> that are slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>.
I will make <WH5414> you perpetual <WH5769> desolations <WH8077>, and your cities <WH5892> shall not return <WH7725>: and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
Because you have said <WH559>, These two <WH8147> nations <WH1471> and these two <WH8147> countries <WH776> shall be mine <WH3423>, and we will possess it <WH3068>; whereas the Lord was there:

Therefore <WH2416>, as I live, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, I will even do <WH6213> according to your anger <WH639>, and according to your envy <WH7068> which you have used <WH6213> out of your hatred <WH8135> against them <WH3045>; and I will make myself known among them <WH8199>, when I have judged you.

And you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>, and that I have heard <WH8085> all your blasphemies <WH5007> which you have spoken <WH559> against the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, They are laid desolate <WH8074>, they are given <WH5414> us to consume <WH402>.
Thus with your mouth <WH6310> you have boasted <WH1431> against me <WH6280>, and have multiplied your words <WH1697> against me <WH8085>: I have heard them.
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; When the whole earth <WH776> rejoices <WH8055>, I will make <WH6213> you desolate <WH8077>.

As you did rejoice <WH8057> at the inheritance <WH5159> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, because it was desolate <WH8074>, so will I do <WH6213> unto you <WH8077>: you shall be desolate, O mountain <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and all Edom <WH123>, even all of it <WH3045>: and they shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
